biotools.summary: CoCoNat is a novel deep-learning based method for predicting coiled-coil regions, register annotation and oligomenrization state. CoCoNat adopts a sequence encoding based on two state-of-the-art protein language models and a deep-learning architetcure to perform prediction.

bioschemas.name: CoCoNat
bioschemas.summary: CoCoNat is a novel deep-learning based method for predicting coiled-coil regions, register annotation and oligomenrization state. CoCoNat adopts a sequence encoding based on two state-of-the-art protein language models and a deep-learning architetcure to perform prediction.
